identificationModule.briefTitle: Cardiac Arrest Registry of the Lombardia Region (Lombardia CARe)
identificationModule.officialTitle: Cardiac Arrest Registry of the Lombardia Region (Lombardia CARe)

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The registry enroll all the patients who suffered an out-of-hospital cardiac arrest in the Lombardia Region with a follow-up up to ten years after the event.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: The registry is an observational study which enroll all the patients who suffered an out-of-hospital cardiac arrest of any etiology in the Lombardia Region The follow-up of the patients is at 1 month after the event, 6 month and every year up to five years after the event.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Out-of-hospital cardiac arrest of any etiology in the Lombardia Region

Exclusion Criteria:

* In-hospital cardiac arrest
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: All the patients who suffered an out-of-hospital cardiac arrest of any etiology in the Lombardia Region
